content.question: Write a paragraph in which you make a defensible claim regarding how Pardlo uses simile and metaphor to convey a complex image of the girls.

frqParts.text: Write a paragraph in which you make a defensible claim regarding how Pardlo uses simile and metaphor to convey a complex image of the girls.

skill.text: Skill 6.B: Identify and explain the function of a metaphor.
